effect.scarlet_violet: If the target is an opponent, inflicts regular damage. If the target is an ally, heals the target for 50% of its max HP.
effect.the_teal_mask: If the target is an opponent, inflicts regular damage. If the target is an ally, heals the target for 50% of its max HP.

effect.legends_za: If the target is an opponent, inflicts regular damage. If the target is an ally, heals the target for 50% of its max HP.
effect.mega_dimension: If the target is an opponent, inflicts regular damage. If the target is an ally, heals the target for 50% of its max HP.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Damages opponents, but heals allies for 50% of their max HP.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Damages opponents, but heals allies for 50% of their max HP.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Damages opponents, but heals allies for 50% of their max HP.
short_effect.legends_za: Damages opponents, but heals allies for 50% of their max HP.
short_effect.mega_dimension: Damages opponents, but heals allies for 50% of their max HP.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a pollen puff that restores its HP instead.
